Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2015 02:03PM Hope_1985 wrote: Hi there. Yes they were also ER/PR negative and HER+. But they were always local recurrence. I only received FAC chemo and Herceptin.
Posts.Title: Stage 3, HER2+ metastatic breast cancer in the lymph Hope_1985 Moderators

Posts.Content: Hope_1985 wrote: Hi there Hope there are some ladies to help shed some light. I have been diagnosed for the 3rd time. I have always has local recurrence after a bilateral mastectomy at the age of 24. Now I have been told after finding a lump under my arm, that my cancer has metastasized to the lymph nodes. After a biopsy, it was found I am ER-/PR- and HER2+. I have not chatted to my doctor yet and currently on no meds. Anyone experienced something similar? Any insight on what your treatment was? I am now 30. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stage 3, HER2+ metastatic breast cancer in the lymph Hope_1985 Moderators
